org.la4j.matrix

Class AbstractSafeMatrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.la4j.matrix.AbstractSafeMatrix
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Externalizable, Serializable, Matrix
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DenseSafeMatrix, SparseSafeMatrix

    public abstract class AbstractSafeMatrix
extends Object
implements Matrix
